CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get in Touch with Handloom Heaven
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you're interested in our products or have any questions, please fill out the form below.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Connect directly with artisans and bring home authentic, high-quality handloom products from our manufacturing units
FEATURE_1_BODY: Display your handloom creations with high-quality images and detailed descriptions, highlighting the craftsmanship behind each piece.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Engage directly with buyers, answer queries, and build lasting relationships to grow your handloom business.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Offer personalized handloom products by allowing customers to request custom designs or modifications.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Enjoy peace of mind with our safe and reliable payment gateway, ensuring smooth transactions for both sellers and buyers.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Easily track your handloom stock, manage orders, and streamline your manufacturing process all in one place.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Boost your sales with built-in promotional features, including special offers, loyalty programs, and social media integration.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our handloom products marketplace
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What types of handloom products do you offer?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: We offer a wide range of handloom products including sarees, fabrics, home decor items, and accessories, all crafted by skilled artisans from various handloom manufacturing units.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How do I know the products are authentic handloom items?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: All products on our platform are sourced directly from verified handloom manufacturing units. Each item comes with a certificate of authenticity, ensuring you receive genuine handcrafted products.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: What is your shipping and return policy?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: We offer nationwide shipping within 5-7 business days. International shipping is available for select countries. We have a 14-day return policy for unused items in their original condition. Please check our detailed shipping and returns page for more information.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How does your app support handloom artisans?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Our app provides a direct marketplace for handloom manufacturing units, eliminating middlemen and ensuring fair prices for artisans. We also invest a portion of our profits in skill development programs for the handloom community.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I customize or place bulk orders?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, we offer customization options for many of our products. For bulk orders, please contact our customer support team, and we'll connect you directly with the manufacturing unit to discuss your requirements and pricing.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Handloom Products
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What types of handloom products do you offer?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: We offer a wide range of handloom products including sarees, dresses, scarves, table linens, curtains, and home decor items. All our products are crafted by skilled artisans using traditional techniques.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How can I be sure of the quality of your handloom products?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: We ensure the highest quality by working directly with certified handloom manufacturers. Each product undergoes strict quality checks before being listed on our app. We also offer a satisfaction guarantee and easy returns if you're not completely satisfied.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Do you offer customization options for your handloom products?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, we do offer customization for many of our products. You can choose from various colors, patterns, and sizes. For bulk orders or specific designs, please contact our customer service team through the app.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: What are the shipping and delivery options for your handloom products?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: We offer worldwide shipping for our handloom products. Delivery times may vary depending on your location. Within India, we typically deliver within 5-7 business days. International orders may take 10-15 business days. You can track your order status through our app.

TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from artisans and customers who have experienced the beauty of our handloom products
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has transformed my small handloom business. I can now reach customers worldwide and showcase my unique creations.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I've never found such exquisite handloom products so easily. The quality and craftsmanship are unparalleled.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a retailer, this app has been a game-changer. I can source authentic handloom products directly from skilled artisans.
